CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1962, page 8.reads: "Evelyn Meades's Beauty School opened last Sunday at 803 N. Homewood Avenue with an open house which drew her scores of friends , cosmotologists, and officials in field. Shown here is a portion of the decorative interior of the school, where the background is soft pink and green with pink hair dryers."
TitMainTitle: Interior of Evelyn Meades Beauty School with hair dryers, chairs with hair washing sinks, linoleum floor, and sign with five female heads
